- Secondary Google Drive Access! Open & Edit files stored in your other Google Accounts! 

- Batch Renamer! Tired of renaming files one by one? No more with CrosExplorer Proâ€™s powerful renaming functions. Use variables to automatically enter file names and editing dates, too!

- File Content Search (Beta) - Forgot where you wrote a much needed note? Search entire directories of documents and their contents using CrosExplorer Pro! 

- File Converter! Want to change a file format but donâ€™t want to install a whole new application? Try out the media-converter function.
